sourcesContent:
PODEtails.js // PODetails.js "use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import axios from "axios" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" import "./PODetails.css" const PODetails = () => { const [poDetails, setPODetails] = useState([]) const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false) const [editingPO, setEditingPO] = useState(null) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ poNumber: "", supplier: "", material: "", quantity: "", rate: "", deliveryDate: "", narration: "", status: "Active", }) const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { fetchPODetails() }, []) const fetchPODetails = async () => { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/po") setPODetails(res.data) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const formErrors = validateForm() if (Object.keys(formErrors).length > 0) { setErrors(formErrors) return } const payload = { ...formData, quantity: parseFloat(formData.quantity), rate: parseFloat(formData.rate), totalAmount: parseFloat(formData.quantity) * parseFloat(formData.rate), } if (editingPO) { await axios.put(await axios.put(`http://localhost:5000/po/${editingPO.id}`, payload)) } else { await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/po", payload) } fetchPODetails() resetForm() } const handleDelete = async (id) => { if (window.confirm("Delete this PO?")) { await axios.delete() fetchPODetails() } } const handleEdit = (po) => { setFormData(po) setEditingPO(po) setShowForm(true) } const resetForm = () => { setFormData({ poNumber: "", supplier: "", material: "", quantity: "", rate: "", deliveryDate: "", narration: "", status: "Active", }) setErrors({}) setEditingPO(null) setShowForm(false) } const validateForm = () => { const newErrors = {} if (!formData.poNumber) newErrors.poNumber = "Required" if (!formData.supplier) newErrors.supplier = "Required" if (!formData.material) newErrors.material = "Required" if (!formData.quantity || formData.quantity <= 0) newErrors.quantity = "Invalid" if (!formData.rate || formData.rate <= 0) newErrors.rate = "Invalid" if (!formData.deliveryDate) newErrors.deliveryDate = "Required" return newErrors } const exportToExcel = () => { const ws = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(poDetails) const wb = XLSX.utils.book_new() XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(wb, ws, "PO") XLSX.writeFile(wb, "po_details.xlsx") } return (

Purchase Order Details

{poDetails.map((po, i) => ( ))}
S.No PO Number Supplier Material Qty Rate Amount Delivery Status Actions
{i + 1} {po.poNumber} {po.supplier} {po.material} {po.quantity} ₹{po.rate} ₹{po.totalAmount} {new Date(po.deliveryDate).toLocaleDateString()} {po.status}
{showForm && (

{editingPO ? "Edit PO" : "Add PO"}

setFormData({ ...formData, poNumber: e.target.value })} /> setFormData({ ...formData, supplier: e.target.value })} /> setFormData({ ...formData, material: e.target.value })} /> setFormData({ ...formData, quantity: e.target.value })} /> setFormData({ ...formData, rate: e.target.value })} /> setFormData({ ...formData, deliveryDate: e.target.value })} />
